name: "Can I play on your phone": the game
name_original: "Can I play on your phone": the game
description:
A FNaF fan game (even though it has nothing to do with it) where you need to survive at the park and not letting kids playing on your phone

THERE ARE FLASHING IMAGES IN THIS GAME!!!!

if you wish to disable these please go to the Extras menu

Made in TurboWarp! (Scratch mod)
